mapper.select: SELECT o.order_no ,o.phone ,o.order_pw ,io.product_id ,io.amount ,p.* FROM `order` o LEFT JOIN product_io io ON o.order_no = io.order_no LEFT JOIN product p ON p.product_id = io.product_id WHERE o.user_id = #{userId}

SELECT o.order_no -- 주문번호 ,o.phone -- 비회원 전화번호 ,o.order_pw -- 비회원 주문 비밀번호 ,io.product_id -- 상품 ID ,io.amount -- 입출고 개수 ,p.* -- 상품 정보 FROM `order` o LEFT JOIN product_io io ON o.order_no = io.order_no LEFT JOIN product p ON p.product_id = io.product_id WHERE o.phone = #{phone} AND o.order_pw = #{orderPw}

SELECT SUM(amount * unit_price) sum_total_price ,SUM(amount) sum_amount FROM `order` o LEFT JOIN product_io io ON o.order_no = io.order_no LEFT JOIN product p ON p.product_id = io.product_id WHERE o.user_id = #{userId}
